params.role: The role with which the task is associated
params.uri: IPFS CID with the off-chain data of the task

returns._0: The id of the newly created task

params.creator: The creator of the task
params.role: The role with which the task is associated
params.uri: IPFS CID with the off-chain data of the task

returns._0: The id of the newly created task

params.endDate: The end date of the task
params.role: The role with which the task is associated
params.startDate: The start date of the task
params.uri: IPFS CID with the off-chain data of the task

returns._0: the address of the daoExpander contract that uses this module.

params.submitionUrl: IPFS CID with the off-chain submission data.

finalize(uint256).notice: A function for finalizing a task.

finalizeFor(uint256,address).notice: A function for finalizing a task for a specific member.

getCompletionTime(uint256,address).notice: Gets the completion time of a task for a specific user.

getStatusPerSubmitter(uint256,address).notice: Gets the status of a task for a specific submitter.

hasCompletedTheTask(address,uint256).notice: Checks if a specific user has completed a task by ID

novaAddress().notice: A plugin contract is deployed for each daoExpander that uses it. When a plugin is associated to a daoExpander, the address is set by the DAOExpander.

submit(uint256,string).notice: A function for submitting a task. Conceptually only the taker can submit it.

take(uint256).notice: A function for taking a task. The signer is the taker.
